name: C.G.B - Car Gun Ball
description:
Car Gun Ball

Car Gun Ball is new arcade game that you need to control your car and dodge the jumping balls on your car while shooting. Make the balls blast & grab the coins!
Each 5 level will comes boss balls! Get Really!

Go Collect all the powerful cars!

FEATURE
◾Swipe to control the car and shooting.
◾Dodge the jump balls or they will crash your car
◾Balls will split to different colors when number get decreased
◾Shoot and make the balls blast & grab coin
◾Upgrade your Fire Rate & Power
◾Kinds of cars are available
◾Joy Never Gone !! Countless levels for shooting & challenge

No Doubt!
No Hesitation!
DOWNLOAD FOR FREE now!!

Well upgraded your cars, see how long you can survive under the raining balls!
